text: Zisas za mba ŋgui bakɨvi gu ŋgui bisarire ga ruigi. Ana ruav, Fhe Bakɨme buni mbararagi pheni vherir verav, Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuin gumgi gu mbigi khɨvav mbe nzuai. Ana mbe nzuav, Fhe Bakɨme wo gumgi gu mbigi ganɨrim, mbe ana piin kɨrga buni vhuuiŋra mbe nzuav, vhɨra mbarkɨrga rɨmrɨɨ ki gumgi gu mbigi, ana mben kurkurigim, mbe rɨmrɨɨ vhɨzi.
